Enables you to select the feat to be removed when curing Ether Disease from a list. You can control the target of this Mod by modifying the cfg file. The default targets are Player, Party, and Others (NPC, Enemy), each of which can be turned on/off. (Default is All On) It is recommended to use "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3379819704] Mod Config GUI [/url]" to modify the cfg file.
